channel.title: Nvm bigger prob..auto game saver busted
channel.description: [s]OK I was coding a command and I had accidentaly deleted my npcreset command :P..I know one of you has it if you could post it here?[PI] sorry for the nubby question lol..[/s] OK well i just realized that my auto game saver is busted, I gained 2 attacks lvls and about an hour later I 'x'd out the cmd box and i lost those 2 lvls. the players game does save when they loggout, but how can I make it where it saves up to every3mins when they're logged in?

item.title: Nvm bigger prob..auto game saver busted
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

OK I was coding a command and I had accidentaly deleted my npcreset command :P…I know one of you has it if you could post it here?[PI]
sorry for the nubby question lol…
OK well i just realized that my auto game saver is busted, I gained 2 attacks lvls and about an hour later I 'x’d out the cmd box and i lost those 2 lvls.
the players game does save when they loggout, but how can I make it where it saves up to every3mins when they’re logged in?

Read full topic
item.source: Nvm bigger prob..auto game saver busted
